analyzed: candrasūtra

original: Wal_1 evaṁ mayā śrutam / ekasamayaṁ bhagavāṁ caṁpāyāṁ viharati gargarapuṣkariṇyās tīre /
analyzed: eva mayā śrutam eka samaya bhagavā capāyāḥ viharati gargarapuṣkariṇyāḥ tīre

original: Wal_2 tena khalu samayena rāhuṇā asurendreṇa sarvaṁ candramaṇḍalam āvṛtaṁ /
analyzed: tena khalu samayena rāhuṇā asura indreṇa sarva candra maṇḍalam āvṛta

original: Wal_3 atha yā devatā tasmiṁ candramaṇḍale sthitā bhītā trastā saṁvignā hṛṣṭaromakūpā yena
analyzed: atha yā devatā candra maṇḍale sthitā bhītā trastā sa vignā hṛṣṭa romakūpā yena

original: bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma / upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthāt / ekāntasthitā
analyzed: bhagavān tena upajagāma upetya bhagavat pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthāt ekānta sthitā
bhagavata gāthayā babhāṣe

original: Wal_4 namas te buddha vīrāstu vipramuktāya savataḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ te buddha vīra astu vipramuktāya savataḥ
sabādha pratipannaḥ smi tasya me śaraṇa bhava

original: Wal_5 loke sugatam arhantaṁ candramāḥ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ /
analyzed: loke sugatam arhanta candramāḥ śaraṇa gataḥ
rāhoḥ candramasa muñca buddhāḥ loka anukapakāḥ
bhagavā gāthayā pratyābhāṣīt
yaḥ hi andhakāre nabhasi
prabhākaraḥ vairocanaḥ
rāho śaśāṅka grasa mā antarīkṣe
prajā pradīpa tvarita vimuñca

original: Wal_7 … / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ / saṁtvaramāṇo ’sau rāhuś candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: sa svid gātraḥ vyathitaḥ sa bādh yathā naraḥ sa tvaramāṇa rāhuḥ candra maṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ

original: Wal_8 tena samayena baḍir virocanapautra āsīd asuraḥ / adrākṣīd baḍir virocanapautro rāhuṇā asurendreṇa tvaritatvaritaṁ candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam  #
analyzed: tena samayena baḍiḥ virocana pautraḥ āsīt asuraḥ adrākṣīt baḍiḥ virocana pautraḥ rāhuṇā asura indreṇa candra maṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam  /

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāḥ velāyāḥ gāthāḥ babhāṣe

original: Wal_9 kiṁ nu saṁtvaramāṇas tvaṁ rāhuś candraṁ vimuñcasi / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ //
analyzed: ki nu sa tvaramāṇaḥ tva rāhuḥ candra vimuñcasi sa svinna gātraḥ vyathitaḥ sa bādhitaḥ yathā naraḥ

original: Wal_10 rāhur avocat // saptadhā me sphalen mūrdhā jīvan na sukham āpnuyāṁ tatra buddhābhigītena muñceyaṁ śaśinaṁ na cet //
analyzed: rāhuḥ avocat saptadhā me sphalet mūrdhā jīvan na sukham tatra buddha abhigītena muñceya śaśina na ced
baḍiḥ virocana pautra gāthayā babhāṣe
madarśinaḥ sabuddhāḥ
teṣā gāthā abhigītena rāhuḥ candra vimuñcati
candrasūtra samāptam
